name: Tametsi
description: Tametsi is a difficult logic game played on a set of tiles, in which you must use the clues provided to discover and mark hidden mines.
minimum_requirements: OS: Vista SP2, 7 SP1, 8.x, 10 (7u85 and above) Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Storage: 250 MB available space Additional Notes: The minimum recommended screen resolution is 1024x768.
